resolve.name: Resolve
resolve.about: Approve or reject a proposal with a group. Asynchronous voting and revising of proposals.

dotstorm.name: Dotstorm
dotstorm.about: Structured brainstorming with sticky notes. Come up with new ideas.

tenpoints.name: Ten Points
tenpoints.about: Come up with a set of values or principles for your group.

firestarter.name: Firestarter
firestarter.about: Go arounds, ice breakers, intros. Get to know each other.
